forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 21C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 69F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
